Introduce of Bliss Plan 

 Bliss means what you feel meaningful.
 Follow your bliss. 
 Make your life meaningful with EMS's Bliss Plan.

string-array.name: launchText
string-array.item: "If you can concentrate always on the present, you'll be a happy man." - Paulo Cuelho
"Men are wise in proportion, not to their experience, but to their capacity for experience." - James Boswell
"True life is lived when tiny changes occur." - Leo Tolstoy
